data.name: CAVE VR
data.detailed_description:
*Only supports Oculus but not other machines, sorry for any inconvenience caused

Game Story Outline :


The player plays an explorer who is accidentally trapped in an ancient mysterious cave. There are messages of ancient residents left in the cave, leading the explorer to operate the ruins in the cave. The clues along the way seem to imply a long story.

Is the end of the ruins the exit of the cave, or the bottomless darkness?

What kind of game is this ?


CAVE It is a puzzle-solving 3DVR game.
Players will play the role of explorers to explore the ruins in the cave, and try to escape from the cave by interacting with the scene organs to solve puzzles.

Gameplay :



Interact with the ruins in the ruins to unlock the seal of the ruins


There are various puzzles waiting for players to solve


Game Features：


  • Immersive virtual ancient ruins, unique immersive art scenes.
  • Solve puzzles using interaction mechanisms corresponding to scene objects.
  • Objects and environmental changes in the ruins will suggest the direction of the plot.

data.name: VIRTUE
data.detailed_description:
VIRTUE: Virtual Interactive Reality Toolkit for Understanding the EIC

Explore the world of collider physics with VIRTUE, a standalone event display application designed for both desktop and virtual reality. Take a closer look at the future Electron-Ion Collider (EIC) at Brookhaven National Lab, or create and upload new detector geometries and particle physics data to be animated.

Features:

ePIC Detector Model:
Investigate the ePIC detector model, including X-Ray and engineering versions, to understand its design.

Simulated Electron-Proton Collisions:
Witness simulated electron-proton collision events, showcasing the science planned for the future EIC.

Customizability:
Customize detector geometries and animate collision data using JSON files, adapting the application to new collision scenarios or experiments beyond the EIC.

Animation Features:
Freely navigate the virtual environment to investigate the detector and individual collisions, or set the camera and event animator on a loop for smooth, professional-level animations to record for presentations and demonstrations.

Education and Outreach:
VIRTUE serves as an educational resource, engaging young students through virtual reality and offering a unique exploration of collider experiments to physics enthusiasts. With its customizable features, VIRTUE offers an excellent opportunity for undergraduate-level projects, allowing students to adapt it to explore and understand new experiments in the field.

Developer: Sean Preins
Supervisor: Prof. Miguel Arratia

Simulations and detector design by the ePIC Collaboration

SketchUp detector model: EIC Project Menagerie

Music: Josh Puddington

This work was supported by the University of California, Office of the President

data.name: Inside the Backrooms
data.detailed_description:
DESCRIPTION

Inside the Backrooms is a Co-op online horror game up to 4 players, where you and your friends will fight to escape from the different levels of the backrooms, solving different puzzles with different mechanics in each one.
This game is based on the famous creepypasta with many real references implemented such as iconic entities and important elements. You will have to explore each room, look for elements that help you to continue advancing throughout the game and unlock new areas, but the further you go, more dangerous it will be, you must pay close attention in the area, identify each entity and know how to avoid them if you want to survive.
Look for supplies, store them in your inventory, explore all the rooms, solve puzzles, unlock areas of the map, interact, try to collect everything you find.
The main objective of Inside the Backrooms is to engage players with its gameplay, difficulty and atmosphere. There are countless identical rooms with an old, dirty carpet and pale yellowish walls, where at first glance it gives you a gloomy and bad feeling where you realize that it is not a safe place.

LEVELS

The game currently has 5 levels, each level is huge and is designed to be more difficult than the previous one and each one with different puzzles and mechanics.

There are also 2 secret mini levels that will lead you to a secret ending..

VIRTUAL REALITY

The game is compatible with VR for those who want to live the most terrifying experience in the backrooms, If you have an Oculus Quest device you can't miss the experience of being trapped in the backrooms in virtual reality.


IMPORTANT: At the moment, VR support is still very poor and you will likely run into issues regarding controls, comfort and compatability. Please do not buy the game for the VR-only experience. We are working hard on improving this and fully include VR support!

ENTITIES

In this game you will find several entities, currently 6 entities, all based on the original creepypasta, each entity will have different ways of attacking and manifesting, so it will be important to know it's behavior of each of these and avoid at all costs that several entities finds you at the same time, if this happens, you will have a bad time.

PUZZLES

Inside the Backrooms has a lot of diverse, interesting and entertaining puzzles, from simple ones to the complex and laborious, they are carefully elaborated with the purpouse of being solved both individually and cooperatively, in addition to this, to make the puzzles more dynamic and attractive, in each new game the solution of all of them changes, which means that it wont be always the same answer! so test your puzzle resolution skills and try to escape from this terrifying place full of mysteries.

ITEMS

If you want to survive in the backrooms you will need to look for essential items and manage them properly, because if you get short of any of them, it could mean your death.
These are some of the items you can find on your journey through the backrooms:
  • Almond Water: Regenerate part of life.
  • Pills: Eliminate Anxiety
  • Radios: Allows communication at a distance with your team
  • Flashlight: Allows you to see in dark areas.
  • Protection Suit: Allows you to prevent getting radiation on some areas.
  • Documents and Notes: Provides relevant information.

FEATURES

Here are some of the current features of the game:
  • Proximity Voice Chat: Talk to the nearest people using the voice chat, but be careful, some entities could hear you...
  • Stamina: The player will have limited stamina that you will need to manage correctly, if an entity is close to you, it will be your best ally to escape.
  • Inventory: You will be able to take various items and store them in your inventory, however, space is limited.
  • Anxiety: When you see an entity, your state of anxiety will increase, going through a disorder of fear and poor visibility.
  • Entities: Each entity has its own attack modes, learn their techniques to evade them.
  • Respawn: The game incorpore a creative and dynamic way to respawn, you will able to respawn up to 3 times.

DEVELOPMENT ROADMAP

We want to keep improving the game, to the point where it becomes one of the best games that represent backroom creepypasta. For this reason we will continue to polishing and adding new content to the game, these are some features that are planned to be added throughout the final development of the game:
  • New Entities
  • More Levels
  • New Puzzles and Mechanics
  • Procedural Levels
  • New Items
  • Improve Gameplay
  • Language Localization

data.name: Solar Quiz VR
data.detailed_description:
HOW TO PLAY



YOUR GOAL: set the solar system above your head in motion.

The planet generator will give you one of the eight planets of the solar system in a random order. You can generate a new planet by clicking on the generator again.
To get useful information about a planet, place it in the analyzer. An informational video will start on the display. In addition to the video, you can hear interesting facts about each planet.
To finish working with a planet, take it from the analyzer and place it in the correct orbit above your head.
When all the planets are placed in the correct orbits, the quiz will be completed and the Solar system will start moving.

GAME FEATURES:
- In Solar Quiz VR you don't need to move around the virtual scene.
- To start the game, pick up the right controller. You can work with the virtual scene using the “trigger” button located under the index finger.
- You can select the language when starting the application: Russian or English.
- The application has background music that can be turned off if necessary.

HOW AND WHERE TO USE SOLAR QUIZ VR:
- individually to test your own knowledge;
- in physics or geography class;
- in English lessons;
- in computer science lessons;
- for conducting open lessons or at events.

data.name: Brick Blaster
data.detailed_description:
In brick blaster you have to keep your ball bouncing. Lose your ball, you lose a life. Pickup new guns from power-up bricks and mince through the rest.
Things get tougher as you progress.

Work your way up the leader board to become the master brick blaster.

The game currently offers a single-player experience where you shoot and bounce your way through waves of blocks picking up more powerful weapons and power-up blocks.
Power-up blocks change the way the ball behaves and provides an advantage. Gun pickups increase your arsenal with which to destroy the blocks faster.

Online leader boards show how you rank vs other players.

data.name: La Bestia: The Migrant's Long Journey
data.detailed_description:
La Bestia: The Migrant's Long Journey is a virtual reality game that provides an immersive experience of the challenges faced by migrants on their journey from South America to the United States of America. The game is set on a train called La Bestia, where you take on the role of a migrant. You will encounter many other migrants on the train, each with their own unique story to share. These stories are based on real events and offer insights into the difficulties and experiences of migrants. You need to move around the environment and get closer to each migrant to hear their story.

The game consists of two scenes. The first scene places you in a train car with other immigrants. It is a contemplative experience where you can interact with the migrants, who are represented as statues, by simply moving around. The second scene takes place inside a train car, and the mechanics are the same as in the first scene. The game automatically switches between the two scenes.

It is a moving experience that offers a glimpse into the harsh reality of the migrant journey.

In this version, all the migrant dialogues are in Spanish.

data.name: Mystery Box VR: Hidden Secrets
data.detailed_description:
Interact with objects, handles, buttons, and wheels on each side. Crack enigmas and collect hidden puzzle tiles on a random side of the boxes.




You won't be able to compare reality with fiction.



Once you unlock all 8 boxes of a Level Pack, you can compose a puzzle and discover a brief history of an invention.



It's not always easy to escape the room, so use all your IQ to crack the riddles. There's a logic behind all of them, even where it seems it's not!





Play the game with your headphones to get immersed in this amazing adventure.



Got stuck on some enigma? No worries, you can still get a helpful hint! You can also get in touch with me in case you really can't make it through a riddle, I'll be glad to help ;)



Available in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, and Japanese.

The game language will change automatically based on the language settings of your device


XSGames is an indie game startup from Italy. Since the first Mystery Box chapter (released on the mobile App Stores in 2021), the series had amazing success with the community of puzzle and escape room gamers.
I hope you'll enjoy playing the Mystery Box adventures as much as I love creating them!

data.name: Гордость Улыпа. VR-легенды Чувашии
data.detailed_description:
Embark on a magical journey in which images from ancient legends, fairy tales and the real history of the Chuvash people are mixed and complement each other.

  • Meet the giant hero Ulyp - the hero of the epic and folk tales - and accept his gifts.

  • Find yourself in the center of the Vortex of time, which will take you through the history of the Chuvash people.
  • Awaken the ancient Elder of the Chuvash oak forests by playing the parappan - a Chuvash double-sided drum.
  • Look at the rising of the three Suns - a phenomenon described in an ancient Chuvash legend.
  • Deal with the mysteries of the three giants by solving puzzles based on national symbols and ornaments.

  • Find ancient images and hear the legend of Khan Kubrat and the Silver Bulgars.

  • Collect all the pages of the tome “Treasures of Chuvashia” and learn about the warrior Goldilocks, the beautiful Narspi, division commander Vasily Chapaev and other real and fictional Chuvash heroes.

Ancient language and delightful examples of folk crafts, modern production and innovative technologies, vibrant national cuisine and centuries-old traditions, rich history and unique culture - the project covers the past, present and future of the Chuvash Republic.

data.name: District VR
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the 'District VR', where the vibrant spirit of Berlin's music and nightlife comes alive in virtual reality. Whether you're a music enthusiast, a budding DJ, or a creative soul, this multiplayer VR world offers an unparalleled experience.

Features at a Glance:

Authentic VR Nightlife: Explore a virtual Berlin, rich in music and culture.
DJ and Music Creation: Mix, produce, and share your music using advanced virtual equipment.
Live Virtual Events: Host or attend dynamic music events and shows.
Artistic Expression: Create and display digital artwork within the game.
Community and Interaction: Engage with a global community of music lovers and creators.

We're eager to evolve 'District VR' with your input! Share your feedback, feature requests, and creative ideas to help shape the future of this virtual world.

Join Our Discord Community:
Be part of the journey from the start. Connect with us on Discord to stay updated, provide feedback, and engage with fellow VR and music enthusiasts. Together, we'll create an extraordinary virtual experience of Berlin's nightlife.

data.name: Supa Fly Racing
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Supa Fly Racing, a VR Racer that delivers shots of adrenaline and fun..

Pit your VR racing skills against rival flies as you scramble through various pipe systems that serve as your race track. Begin your racing journey as a Training Fly in the Training Cup and zoom through gentler, introductory tracks, qualifying for each new, more difficult and action packed cup to work your way up to Race Fly, where all hell breaks loose.

Use your head to steer, where you look is where you go. Your throttle is controlled by moving your hands further and closer from your body.

There 4 types of Supa Fly.

TRAINING FLY
Slow to turn and not the fastest. The perfect specs for new players to become comfortable with 3D VR racing.

POO FLY
More aggressively set-up than the Training Fly, agile and performant but still very manageable.

SPORTS FLY
Ready for some serious speed? This is the one.

RACE FLY
Super fast, super agile. This is a hardcore fly to race with.

* 16 Race Pipes including circuits and point to point.
* 4 Championship Cups with a linear progression system that requires at least 3rd place to qualify for the next round.
* Single Race Mode with Pipe Tracks and Supa Flies available once unlocked in Championship Mode.
* Practice Mode with all tracks unlocked and flies available once through progression in Championship Mode.

data.name: Christmas: Dark Side
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever wondered what those Christmas glass balls are really hiding?
But I know..! And this Christmas story is not as usual. Yes, there is the Santa Claus, his reindeer and gifts for children. But these are not at all the gifts that a child expects for Christmas. And you can’t even imagine what awaits you that night!
Have you ever pissed on snowmen and elves? Or fed poisoned popcorn to the deer? I'm sure not! And it’s unlikely that you went down into a cursed dungeon with ghosts to find gifts and the treasured key to the chest!

Waiting for you:
- Search and sort items
- Explore the dungeon
- Interact with Christmas creatures
- Launch Santa to the moon
- And lots of funny moments

data.name: Block Hunter
data.detailed_description:
"Block Hunter is a music rhythm game that combines party game, online competitions, and maybe rogue lite genes,and one more thing..."
"Give me the mic,mic-check,1,2,3...
Okay,listen up,folks:
As everyone knows,the BLOCK Galaxy is the motherlode of Block storage in the Cosmos. But it's also a hot zone for the Block Pirates who love causing chaos and looting. That's why we got a bunch of Block Hunter volunteers going to take down those infamous Block pirates. The pirate cargo ships are filled with piles of loot and powerful weapons, Although each hunt is both dangerous and thrilling, the rich reward and glorious leaderboard make everyone want to take their chance for themselves, um... I mean,of course，All for the glory of the BLOCK Galaxy.
- Endless hunting experience （you'd stick it out）
- Groovy beats（More and more updates in the future）
- Mystery perks （You deserve it）
- Ranking competition（Not vanity）
- Local multi-user login（compete your family or Friends）

data.name: The Infinite Inside
data.detailed_description:
INFINITE REALITIES AWAIT. EXPLORE THE IMPOSSIBLE. UNCOVER THE TRUTH.


A mysterious, monolith-like object appears in your home, transforming into a portal to an alternate reality filled with geometric impossibilities and mind-bending challenges. Are you prepared to explore the impossible and uncover a hidden mystery?

INFINITE REALITIES AWAIT: Step from your living room into a dream-like, immersive alternative reality. Here, impossible spaces and abstract geometric architecture challenge your perceptions of what's possible and impossible.



EXPLORE THE IMPOSSIBLE: Embark on a journey through a surreal reality, where you'll solve intricate puzzles and collect the necessary keys to progress. Each step you take leads you deeper into this extraordinary world.



UNCOVER THE TRUTH: Immerse yourself in a narrative rich with environmental storytelling. Are you prepared to unravel the hidden mysteries that await?

data.name: Endless Wonder VR
data.detailed_description:
Endless Wonder VR is a colorful VR platformer in which you will need to use the capabilities of VR to complete a campaign consisting of various levels. You must avoid enemies and their attacks. They will try to send you back to the last save zone, so you must be dexterous enough, to avoid all their attacks.


The whole game is based on the unique sticks mechanics. You should try to unlock them all and use their abilities to finish all levels. Each level provides a unique stylized environment and a set of obstacles and enemies. Discover all the secrets of the world of Endless Wonder and get a lot of positive emotions.


Our game will provide you with a unique experience that you have never encountered anywhere before, because we implemented unique game mechanics which you can combine in any way which you want. Endless Wonder requires a fast reaction in some situations, so you should always be on the alert.

data.name: Elfin Around
data.detailed_description:
In this immersive game, you get to play as one of Santa's elves.

You are in charge of the production line, so it is in your hands to produce the prettiest, most unique toys for children all over the world!

Grab a core, put some limbs to it however you like, and choose a box to fit it in! Once you have your box, you can choose its color too!

Don't forget to place it in Santa's sledge!

Put on your VR headset and step in this immersive experience, where you get to use your hands to grab and place all sorts of arms and legs to your toy, even wings!

Once you are happy with your creation, it'll be analyzed so you can choose the best box to wrap it in, but be careful, a wrong kind of box will result in a piece of coal!

As your gift is ready to be delivered, you will have to throw it onto Santa's sledge yourself! (Just don't forget to customize the colors of your box).

data.name: Rock and Roots
data.detailed_description:
On a warm summer night, when the stars twinkle like fireflies and the rustling leaves whisper secrets in the deep woods, a captivating fairy tale weaves itself like magic around the flickering flames of a campfire.
This story began in a majestic Сastle on a Rock. Once upon a time there reigned a noble Lord loved and revered by his subjects. In his pursuit of wealth and safety, the Lord pressed upon the forest dwellers who called the thicket their home. The wild creatures were compelled to abandon their nests and retreat deeper into the woods. As years flowed like a river, the kingdom flourished, and the Lord's legacy continued through his two heirs. In a world where tradition dictated that the elder son ascend the throne, the younger one's heart seethed with jealousy that painted his thoughts a shade of darkness. In a moment when the old Lord breathed his last, his elder son found himself framed. His left hand was severed from his body by the very sibling he once called kin. The pain of betrayal and his father's death propelled him into a desperate escape, and he vanished deep into the woods.
In the heart of those enchanted woods, where ancient secrets were whispered through the rustling leaves, the elder son encountered the Wild Spirit – a sentinel of the land, as old as the forest itself. This guardian of the woods extended him a helping hand, infusing the elder son's life with new purpose, granting him the ability to summon the very creatures his father had once displaced.

End of story? Not at all. Everything is just beginning for you.
Embrace the power that springs forth from the heart of the woods, and let your journey through this fairy tale awaken the hero within you!


What am I supposed to do?
Guided by instinct and your own strategic acumen, you wield the power to dictate the ebb and flow of battle. Each encounter becomes a tactical dance, an intricate interplay of forces where you strategically choose and deploy your allies – the Sprigs – to conquer trials and adversaries that bar your path. The secret lies in the cards that adorn your left hand, each bearing the essence of a specific Spring. As you deftly select and unveil these cards, you set in motion a symphony of magic and nature, your chosen allies springing to life to face the challenges that await.

Who are my enemies?
Once-noble knights. Their honor washed away like the fading memories of a distant era. Clad in tarnished armor, the knights wield an arsenal of weaponry. They grip bows with arrows that whistle through the air, seeking to pierce your defenses. Maces swing in heavy arcs, seeking to crush your resistance with sheer force. Swords gleam menacingly, slicing through the air with a deadly elegance. Hammers, gripped tightly, strike the earth and unleash shockwaves, threatening to shatter your resolve.

What do my Sprigs have against them?
Within the embrace of the ancient forest, your loyal Sprigs emerge, each adorned with an array of weaponry as diverse as the foliage that surrounds them.
One of your steadfast companions wields a formidable wooden club. Another brandishes a massive log, a symbol of their unyielding connection to the land. A third ally grips a gleaming sword, poised to cleave through the ranks of your adversaries. Another companion dons a stout shield and thrusts forward with a sharpened spear. Twin daggers glint in the dappled sunlight, wielded by another of your comrades with swift precision. And amidst the clash of steel, an ally hefts a massive ax, each swing cleaving through opposition with a resounding impact.
Beyond the physical arsenal that accompanies you, your magic gauntlet pulses with arcane energy. Within its depths, spells of great power lie dormant, awaiting your command.

I want to have more power
Well, here's a little-known secret that the forest whispers to you in its ancient tongue. As you vanquish these fallen knights, a shimmering residue remains – the essence of their shattered dignity and lost glory. These soul fragments hold a hidden power, one that can be harnessed and saved within your piggy bank – a mystical repository of souls.
With each soul captured, the piggy bank resonates with a pulsating energy, a testament to the knights' struggles and their eventual redemption through your actions. These souls become your currency of growth, allowing you to venture deeper into the forest's heart and unlock the potential power of your Sprigs.
data.about_the_game:
On a warm summer night, when the stars twinkle like fireflies and the rustling leaves whisper secrets in the deep woods, a captivating fairy tale weaves itself like magic around the flickering flames of a campfire.
This story began in a majestic Сastle on a Rock. Once upon a time there reigned a noble Lord loved and revered by his subjects. In his pursuit of wealth and safety, the Lord pressed upon the forest dwellers who called the thicket their home. The wild creatures were compelled to abandon their nests and retreat deeper into the woods. As years flowed like a river, the kingdom flourished, and the Lord's legacy continued through his two heirs. In a world where tradition dictated that the elder son ascend the throne, the younger one's heart seethed with jealousy that painted his thoughts a shade of darkness. In a moment when the old Lord breathed his last, his elder son found himself framed. His left hand was severed from his body by the very sibling he once called kin. The pain of betrayal and his father's death propelled him into a desperate escape, and he vanished deep into the woods.
In the heart of those enchanted woods, where ancient secrets were whispered through the rustling leaves, the elder son encountered the Wild Spirit – a sentinel of the land, as old as the forest itself. This guardian of the woods extended him a helping hand, infusing the elder son's life with new purpose, granting him the ability to summon the very creatures his father had once displaced.

End of story? Not at all. Everything is just beginning for you.
Embrace the power that springs forth from the heart of the woods, and let your journey through this fairy tale awaken the hero within you!


What am I supposed to do?
Guided by instinct and your own strategic acumen, you wield the power to dictate the ebb and flow of battle. Each encounter becomes a tactical dance, an intricate interplay of forces where you strategically choose and deploy your allies – the Sprigs – to conquer trials and adversaries that bar your path. The secret lies in the cards that adorn your left hand, each bearing the essence of a specific Spring. As you deftly select and unveil these cards, you set in motion a symphony of magic and nature, your chosen allies springing to life to face the challenges that await.

Who are my enemies?
Once-noble knights. Their honor washed away like the fading memories of a distant era. Clad in tarnished armor, the knights wield an arsenal of weaponry. They grip bows with arrows that whistle through the air, seeking to pierce your defenses. Maces swing in heavy arcs, seeking to crush your resistance with sheer force. Swords gleam menacingly, slicing through the air with a deadly elegance. Hammers, gripped tightly, strike the earth and unleash shockwaves, threatening to shatter your resolve.

What do my Sprigs have against them?
Within the embrace of the ancient forest, your loyal Sprigs emerge, each adorned with an array of weaponry as diverse as the foliage that surrounds them.
One of your steadfast companions wields a formidable wooden club. Another brandishes a massive log, a symbol of their unyielding connection to the land. A third ally grips a gleaming sword, poised to cleave through the ranks of your adversaries. Another companion dons a stout shield and thrusts forward with a sharpened spear. Twin daggers glint in the dappled sunlight, wielded by another of your comrades with swift precision. And amidst the clash of steel, an ally hefts a massive ax, each swing cleaving through opposition with a resounding impact.
Beyond the physical arsenal that accompanies you, your magic gauntlet pulses with arcane energy. Within its depths, spells of great power lie dormant, awaiting your command.

I want to have more power
Well, here's a little-known secret that the forest whispers to you in its ancient tongue. As you vanquish these fallen knights, a shimmering residue remains – the essence of their shattered dignity and lost glory. These soul fragments hold a hidden power, one that can be harnessed and saved within your piggy bank – a mystical repository of souls.
With each soul captured, the piggy bank resonates with a pulsating energy, a testament to the knights' struggles and their eventual redemption through your actions. These souls become your currency of growth, allowing you to venture deeper into the forest's heart and unlock the potential power of your Sprigs.

Summon your enigmatic guardians of the woods with a magical hand to face the challenges. Conjure spells, dive into the magic world and reclaim your rightful place on the throne!

data.name: Planetary Parfait
data.detailed_description: Based on ASU’s Mars Space Flight Facility JMARS GIS tool, Planetary Parfait is a platform designed to support a wide range of scientific research tasks, including geologic mapping, feature analysis, and mission planning. The platform includes a variety of tools and features to support these tasks, such as 3D visualization, annotation tools, and data layers that can be overlaid on top of the terrain data. It is intended to be used by researchers and scientists working in fields such as planetary geology, geography, and geophysics, as well as by educators and students interested in learning about planetary science.

data.name: Locked in a room while: Visiting an old Castle
data.detailed_description:
Locked in a Room While: Exploring an old Castle is a Virtual Reality Escape Game.

In this first episode of the "Locked in a Room While" series, you find yourself trapped in an ancient dungeon and must unravel the mysteries to escape!

  • Roomscale compatible (plan for approximately 3x3m play area)
  • Compatible with standing, static, and seated play
  • No time limit
  • No monsters or screamers, a game for the whole family!
  • 6 puzzles to solve
  • Between 30 and 60 minutes of gameplay



Immerse yourself in the captivating adventure of our virtual reality escape game, where the mysteries of an ancient castle await you. In this enthralling experience, you'll be transported to an exquisitely decorated room, steeped in history and secrets waiting to be explored.



You'll need ingenuity and logic to overcome various puzzles and decipher mysterious codes to escape from this place.
Explore every detail of this castle room, where each object may hold the key to decrypting the next crucial puzzle.



The sensation of experiencing an Escape Game while having the ability to move around makes the experience unique and immersive.
With warm graphics and captivating soundscapes, you'll find yourself facing intriguing challenges at every turn.



Here you are, stuck in a room while you were simply visiting a castle. Fortunately, all this adventure unfolds in your living room, ensuring you stay warm and can take a break whenever you want. Away from stress and panic, take your time and find the solution.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1760330/Noseka_The_Gold_Project/

data.name: MechAvenger
data.detailed_description:
MechAvenger is a fast paced VR shooter and platformer about fighting robots after the end of humanity. Shoot, punch, jump and climb your way through the enemy horde, and shut down their factory.



Take down enemies with 9 unique weapons, using your quick reload belt to keep them firing! Bash your enemies with weapons and fists to knock them to the ground.



The robotic horde is plentiful, but ammo is not. Search your environment for extra weapons and ammo. Kill stunned enemies with a melee hit for an ammo bonus!



Navigate platforming sections by climbing and flinging yourself off walls. Swing with the grappling hook to cross long pits and build speed. Get yourself out of harms way with your servo powered dodge.

data.name: Horizon of Horus
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord Channel


About the Game

Embark on a thrilling journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of Ancient Egypt in "Horizon of Horus" – a Virtual Reality action-tower defense game. Immerse yourself in a world of magic and mythology, where you are the last line of defense against mythological creatures.

Key Features:

  • Take on the role of Horus and use your versatile magical crossbow to defend Egypt.
  • Confront Seth, the Shadow of the Sands, as he seeks to cast the realm into eternal night.
  • Wield a powerful magical crossbow with four unique ammo types, each offering its own form of destruction.
  • Strategically deploy eight distinct traps to halt the advance of three varied enemy types across three stunning levels.
  • Explore an intricately designed world that echoes the grandeur of Ancient Egypt, featuring atmospheric visuals and stunning visual effects.
  • Experience intuitive gameplay with a user interface designed for seamless and intuitive interaction.

What’s the Plan?

During Early Access, we'll actively engage with the community and expand the game:
  • Introduce more levels and challenges.
  • Add new and diverse enemy types and final bosses.
  • Incorporate an ancient Khopesh with melee attack abilities.
  • Expand your arsenal of weapons and traps.

Your feedback is instrumental in this journey. Join us and be a part of the evolution!

data.name: Astro Hunters VR
data.detailed_description:
Check out our other titles

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2153780/Survival_Nation/https://store.steampowered.com/app/503770/Elven_Assassin/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1481700/Private_Property/


About the Game



Embark on an epic interstellar journey in Astro Hunters VR, the open-world VR action game set in space. Immerse yourself in the exploration of diverse planets, fight with different enemies, craft, gather resources and upgrade your weapons – either solo or in multiplayer.


Explore the mothership and the uncharted territories of unique planets, each brimming with diverse landscapes, challenging terrains, and hidden secrets. Discover a wealth of resources and encounter various alien species that add an extra layer of excitement to your interstellar journey.




Arm yourself with a diverse range of weapons and customize your arsenal with unique modifications. Engage in intense battles against a multitude of enemies each presenting distinct challenges that test your combat skills and strategy.




Upgrade your equipment and engage in complex crafting to enhance your arsenal. Gather resources and trade with others.
Join forces with other players in a multiplayer experience. Take part in cooperative exploration, interact with other players, and collaborate to achieve common goals.



Will you enter the unknown and conquer the space? The universe awaits you exploration in "Astro Hunters VR".

data.name: Foothold
data.detailed_description:
In this VR tower defense game, protect your community of survivors from the corrupting forces of Malice. Harness your gravity glove to collect and sling scraps, construct turrets, and guard the builders as they repair the wall.



Wield your gravity glove to:
  • Fight: Capture enemies in your gravity beam and launch to send them packing!
  • Build: Gather scrap metal to build turrets and fortify your defenses.
  • Scan: Uncover the strengths and weaknesses of each enemy type and learn how best to defeat them.



    Battle five different enemy types with their own unique attacks, from small and slimy Bitterness to the heavily-armored tank, Malice—all inspired by Ephesians 4.

data.name: OFFROAD VR
data.detailed_description:
Offroad VR is an exhilarating virtual reality experience, offering a challenging physics-based offroad driving game. In this game, players must navigate difficult terrains, using gears effectively to overcome obstacles and demonstrating timely reflexes to progress. With different tracks, changing weather conditions, and various vehicle options, this game brings the realistic offroad experience into the virtual world.

Game Features:

Physics-Based Challenges: In a game where players encounter real offroad challenges, mastering vehicle control is essential to navigate through challenging terrains.

Diverse Vehicles: Offroad VR provides a variety of vehicle options, allowing players to explore different experiences—from ATVs to offroad vehicles, delve into various classes of vehicles to conquer the tracks.

Different Tracks and Weather Conditions: The game offers an exciting offroad experience with varying track difficulties and different weather conditions. Conquer challenges in snow, rain, mud, and more.

Explore Offroad VR:

Offroad VR combines adrenaline-pumping offroad adventures with virtual reality, providing gamers with a realistic driving experience. Explore different tracks with various vehicles and push the limits of your offroad passion.


!!! Oculus controllers cannot be used unless set as the default OpenXR Runtime for the Oculus computer. Please enter the Oculus application, go to Settings, then navigate to General. Click on the option 'Set Meta Quest Link as active' located next to the OpenXR Runtime selection.If SteamVR is open, you also need to restart it. !!!

Offroad VR combines adrenaline-pumping offroad adventures with virtual reality, providing gamers with a realistic driving experience. Explore different tracks with various vehicles and push the limits of your offroad passion.


!!! Oculus controllers cannot be used unless set as the default OpenXR Runtime for the Oculus computer. Please enter the Oculus application, go to Settings, then navigate to General. Click on the option 'Set Meta Quest Link as active' located next to the OpenXR Runtime selection.If SteamVR is open, you also need to restart it. !!!
data.short_description: Offroad VR combines challenging physics-based offroad driving with virtual reality, offering an exciting game that allows players to explore diverse tracks with different vehicles.

data.name: Pulsar, The VR Experience
data.detailed_description:
(COMPATIBLE with Oculus Rift and Quest with Link Cable to supported PC)

PULSAR is an award-winning 40-minute Immersive Art Installation with occasional interaction: a tribute to the imaginative spirit of six-year-old Eloise who lost her battle with leukemia.

Three portals into deep space. Three unique, music-driven journeys.

PULSAR invites you to enter an artistic representation of Eloise’s final birthday wish. You are now a Galactic Observer and a Virtual Astronaut. You can transcend the fragility and physical restrictions of human existence and experience another dimension. Witness galactic events, the birth and demise of stars and planetary systems. Soak up the sights and sounds. Enjoy the slow discovery. Hear the captivating melodies of the Universe. Harness the energy in the pit of a Black Hole. Affect the flow of linear time. Venture on an unusual spacewalk. Demolish fierce asteroids to protect a planet from destruction. Co-create solar systems based on the rhythms, textures, and colors of universal frequencies. Extras offer you a 3D volume of scientific facts and animations.

PULSAR promises you delight, awe, wonder, and the freedom to create your own interpretation.

(Note: Headphones are recommended to experience the full audio immersion of Pulsar, The VR Experience)

data.name: HealQuest
data.detailed_description:
Dive into an immersive and revitalizing experience with HealQuest, a revolutionary VR game that redefines the concept of playful physical activity. Transport yourself to a breathtaking tropical island, where idyllic landscapes invite adventure and well-being.

At the heart of HealQuest lies an innovative goal: to get moving in order to explore and interact with the environment. As you stroll through the island's winding trails, discover entry points that trigger dynamic and entertaining sports exercises. Whether performing jumps, stretches or cardio exercises, each activity is seamlessly integrated into the exploration of this paradise world.

One of the most captivating aspects of HealQuest lies in its interaction with the island's inhabitants: colorful, cheerful characters who invite you to play and progress. Forge bonds with local animals, overcome creature-specific challenges and improve your skills as you discover the island's secrets.

Thanks to visually stunning environments, total immersion in virtual reality and a variety of playfully integrated sports activities, HealQuest offers a unique gaming experience. Stimulating body and mind, this game invites players to escape on an enchanting adventure where fun, exploration and fitness meet.

Developed by the studio Voskalia, HealQuest is much more than a simple VR video game; it's an invitation to discover the pleasure of physical exercise and exploration in a heavenly setting, offering a revolutionary and refreshing gaming experience.

data.name: Battle of Fate
data.detailed_description:
We're excited to announce that our location-based entertainment (LBE) game has been adapted for online platforms and is now available on Steam. The game was originally designed to be an experience that could only be enjoyed in a specific location, but we've adapted it to be a unique online experience. We've made some minor changes to the game and are releasing it in Early Access, but we'd love to hear your feedback to make it even better. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, and we look forward to creating new online experiences together!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Embark on a thrilling journey in "Battle of Fate," a gripping first-person PvE shooter where players confront relentless waves of enemies. Navigate through dynamically generated environments featuring randomized maps, weapons, monsters, and items, ensuring each playthrough is a unique and unpredictable experience.

In a world where destinies vary, not all tales unfold with joy. For those burdened with adversity, a chance arises to reshape their narrative. Enter the "Battle of Destiny," where the crucible of death's trials awaits, offering the prospect to carve a fresh and formidable destiny. Are you ready to face the challenges and rewrite your fate?

data.name: Counter Attack
data.detailed_description:
We're excited to announce that our location-based entertainment (LBE) game has been adapted for online platforms and is now available on Steam. The game was originally designed to be an experience that could only be enjoyed in a specific location, but we've adapted it to be a unique online experience. We've made some minor changes to the game and are releasing it in Early Access, but we'd love to hear your feedback to make it even better. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, and we look forward to creating new online experiences together!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Immerse yourself in the intense world of "Counter Attack," a gripping defense-based first-person shooter that propels players through a narrative-rich journey, challenging them to withstand relentless waves of enemies.

In the distant future, a pinnacle of artificial intelligence emerges—a cyborg born of cutting-edge science and the forefront of human innovation. However, this triumph of technology becomes a dire threat as a radical terrorist organization unleashes a legion of artificially intelligent cyborgs. Transformed into merciless killing machines, these cyborgs swiftly thrust humanity to the edge of annihilation.

Now, the remnants of humanity rally for a counterattack against the relentless onslaught of the cyborg menace. As you step into the shoes of the last defenders, gear up for an epic battle where survival is not just a choice but a necessity. Can you thwart the mechanical onslaught and rescue what's left of humanity from the brink of destruction? The fate of the future rests in your hands.

data.name: Long Trip
data.detailed_description:
Game Concept
During a protracted holy war, a young knight, barely tested in battle, receives an unexpected call to duty. An ancient deity, revered for centuries entrusts the knight with the weighty task of bringing peace to a land torn apart by sectarian strife.




Battle System
Players must know how to use their weapons or spells well, whether it's a far-away battle or a close one. This way, they can become one with their weapon and be unbeatable. If the battle is too hard, don't be proud and use traps or poison to win. The most important thing on this long trip is to stay alive.

Combat mechanics don't just involve straightforward HP reduction. Players can also use shields to counter enemy attacks and achieve a decisive blow. The game also features stealth elements, allowing players to quickly take out enemies without being detected.


Boss Design
In the world of 'Long Trip,' players will encounter various corrupted enemies in the land of the living, as well as ancient deities who rule over each domain. Players may face human-like Bosses with rich and diverse abilities, or massive and majestic Titans.

Mount System
Your mount will be your most important partner in exploring the world, taking you to places inaccessible on foot, such as mountains and skies, and helping you in boss battle.
· Tame horses for quick movement and charging attacks 🏇.
· Tame wolves for independent combat and fast movement 🐺.
· Raise a dragon to conquer the skies and defeat aerial enemies 🐲.
Discover more mysterious creatures awaiting your exploration...

Party System
Summon NPC warriors to fight alongside you in epic battles. Especially important in large-scale battles, they become your sharpest force.




Collection & Exploration
Collecting and exploring directly affects your outcome in each battle, and every map has many valuable treasures left behind, including weapons, magic, materials, and consumables. Using these resources wisely can make seemingly impossible battles much easier.

Forging System
When Ark arrives at each new map, players need to prepare for battle, such as repairing damaged weapons that have been used before or creating corresponding combat equipment in the forging room ( such as a sufficient number of bows and arrows need to be prepared to deal with enemies flying in the air or enemies with long-range attacks).

Cooking System
Each campsite has a fire where you can cook collected ingredients into high-energy dishes with special effects. Some dishes fill your stomach, while others grant additional magical abilities to help you in your adventure (such as finding magic potion recipes).



Embark on a thrilling adventure across a mystical world filled with wonders and danger. Long Trip offers an unparalleled VR experience, combining breathtaking visuals, heart-pumping combat, and immersive gameplay.

Game Features:

· Thrilling Combat: Engage in fast-paced, action-packed battles using a variety of formidable weapons.
· Mounted Slashing Charge: Experience the rush of mounted combat in VR, delivering a truly on-the-spot experience.
· Boss Design: Encounter a diverse array of bosses, each with distinct abilities and tactics, culminating in epic showdowns against titanic foes.
· VR Interaction: Enjoy seamless and intuitive VR controls, ensuring a smooth and comfortable experience whether you're fighting or riding.
· Grand Scene: Explore a vast and sprawling world, filled with breathtaking vistas and grandiose war scenarios.
· Mount System: Develop a deep bond with your loyal mounts, training and customizing them to fit your needs.
· Forging System: Craft and upgrade your weapons, tailoring them to match your playstyle and preferences.
· Cooking System: Prepare a wide variety of mouthwatering dishes and magical potions, providing sustenance and strength for your journey.

data.name: Clamb
data.detailed_description:
Clamb is a punishing VR climbing game inspired by the game 'Getting Over It'. You climb a surreal mountain with nothing but a hammer. The hammer follows the movement of your controllers. Hit, push and drag your hammer past obstacles to get over them. It will be difficult at first, but practice makes perfect.

  • Climb a surreal mountain that reaches into the stratosphere.
  • No checkpoints will save you from falling.
  • Your skills will be tested, your limits broken.
  • Tunnelling available to alleviate motion sickness. (Vignette)
  • There is a reward for those who reach the top.

I know it's quite a clamber up those rocks, but once you get to the top, the view is worth it.



It's not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.

data.name: Gun Fighting
data.detailed_description:
We're excited to announce that our location-based entertainment (LBE) game has been adapted for online platforms and is now available on Steam. The game was originally designed to be an experience that could only be enjoyed in a specific location, but we've adapted it to be a unique online experience. We've made some minor changes to the game and are releasing it in Early Access, but we'd love to hear your feedback to make it even better. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation, and we look forward to creating new online experiences together!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Simple, straightforward controls
Casual gun usage, simple rules, and linear progression make the game easy to pick up and play.
so even beginners who have never used VR can get up to speed quickly.

* Fast-paced combat
Fast-paced 1v1 battles on small but dense battlefields.
Test your skills in more tense and fast-paced battles

data.name: ShadowStrikeVR
data.detailed_description:
"ShadowStrikeVR" is a sniper-themed VR shooting game and an award-winning entry in the Qualcomm XR Contest. Players take on the role of the protagonist "Shadow," embarking on a journey from a simple revenge mission to gradually shouldering the responsibility of rebuilding the world order, ultimately undertaking a transcendent hunting spree across time and space.

Game Features: Immersive sniper-themed storyline experience; deeply optimized interactive controls; a variety of cold and hot weapons and props; rich scene levels and mission modes, all designed to provide you with a new experience in VR sniper shooting games!

-------------------------------------------Gorgeous Divider--------------------------------
Additional Information:
For detailed game procedures and gameplay instructions, please refer to the "ShadowStrikeVR Game Manual" on this page.
If you wish to engage in discussions with the developers and other players, feel free to join the QQ group: 429947963.

data.name: FAN POP RHYTHM STAGE〜Aim for the♡〜
data.detailed_description:
Idol experience in VR!
A new action casual VR game where you can enjoy shooting x dancing with your favorite music!

Become an idol and liven up the stage!
Fun Pop Rhythm Stage ~Aim for the♡~" is a new type of idol experience action casual VR game where you become an idol and liven up the stage with fansa and dances.
The game is equipped with a function that reads your song data (mp3, wav, etc.) and automatically generates a music score, allowing you to play the game with your favorite songs.

In this game, the player alternates between the "shooting part" in which the player shoots fans who appear one after another during the live performance, and the "dancing part" in which the player dances to the music.

The "shooting part" is to shoot the hearts of the fans!
The "Shooting Part" is a shooting game in which you have to shoot out fans' fan fans.
There are three types of fansa: "Burn", "Peace", and "Heart".
Quickly identify and return the fansa to get evaluation points from the fans!


Dance and get the voltage up!
The "Dance Part" is a dance game in which you trace the notes that appear in the space.
The voltage gauge, which indicates the excitement of the audience, rises when you dance successfully!
The higher the voltage gauge is, the more bonus points will be added to the evaluation points in the shooting part.


Two theme songs are included!
In the "Play with Demo Songs" mode, you can play with two songs that are the theme songs of this work, "Hajimaru Ne☆" Karin ver. (CV. Reo Kurachi) and "Hajimaru Ne☆" Zakuro ver. (CV. Shun Abe)

Idol experience with your favorite songs!
This title is equipped with an "automatic music score generation function" that generates a music score by importing your own music data (MP3, WAV format).
Please enjoy this title by generating a music score with your favorite song.

Story.
The president of an office on the verge of bankruptcy discovered that you have a talent for fansa! and you are now set to make your idol debut.
With the support of your twin idols, Karin Seira and Zakuro Seira, you will struggle to win the hearts of your fans with your fansa and dance moves.

Navigation Character
Karin Hoshirai (CV. Reo Kurachi)
She is the most exciting idol in the office. She is the older twin sister of Pomegranate.
She loves to sing and calls herself the best idol of her generation.
When she learns that her office is in danger of going bankrupt, she is more eager than anyone else to nurture new idols,
She is a serious supporter of players who have a talent for fanzines.

Hoshirai Zakuro (CV. Shun Abe)
An idol popular with both men and women. He and Karin are twin sisters and younger brothers.
He is very athletic and learns dance choreography quickly.
He is serious in everything he does and often acts as a stopper for his older sister, who is always spinning her wheels.
He wants to avoid the bankruptcy of his office for his secret dream, so he expects a lot from his players.

Cautions
When using the automatic music score generation function (in-game function name: "Play with your favorite music") to distribute or post videos of game play with various music data loaded, please be sure to confirm that you have obtained the permission of the copyright holder (copyright holder) for the music.
Unauthorized use without permission may be punishable by law.

We do not collect, check, or save any of the music data loaded by the automatic music score generation function. Please check with the respective copyright holders by yourself.
We are not responsible for any trouble caused by users using the various functions of this game to distribute or post videos. Please understand this in advance.

data.name: Onsui
data.detailed_description:
WELCOME TO HELL.


Onsui is a half-cosy cross between physics action games and strategic puzzlers. Drop, Match and Combine imps to grow them into a larger shape and increase your score. The more space you use, the harder it gets.
You're a new intern in hell and your job is to sort out these mischevious imps.


Hold items in your offhand for later use!

REACH GREATER HIGHS


Rack up points and achieve combos of combinations to reach new high scores.

Rising Overflow Mode


A faster-paced gamemode where the floor of the box is constantly rising! Merge imps and quickly lower the floor to survive.

data.name: Baggage Inspector
data.detailed_description:
Baggage Inspector
Baggage Inspector… a job title that speaks excitement! Passion! Adventure! Or… maybe not. Ok. Definitely not. Can you imagine a less exciting job, than standing at a conveyor belt, taking suitcase after suitcase, fiddling with their locks, opening, closing, pulling them through the computer scanner, dragging them to the correct dispatch gate… oh, and discovering drugs, firearms, and… wait, are those explosives? What do you mean, they’re primed to go off? Is that an active countdown timer?!

In Baggage Inspector, you put on the gloves of a brand new inspector, commencing training at the futuristic Interplanetary Transfer Station, where you will control the flow of traffic between Earth and the mining colonies on the Outer Planets. But before you even begin this assignment, you must first learn on the job. And what better way to learn, than… in a virtual reality simulated scenario? Step into VR-within-VR, where you will train by checking bags for the oppressive regime of Redlandia, where nothing is what it seems.

Take the next step in VR!
Had fun with all those simulator games? We did too! But there was something missing, something we couldn’t put our fingers on… yes, that’s it! Hands! Baggage Inspector is the next step in your VR journey: use your controllers as gloves, grab things by wrapping your virtual fingers around them, and… be careful, that’s a heavy case! Use both hands at once. With Baggage Inspector, you can train yourself for more advanced VR titles.

A bagload of fun
Think suitcases are all the same? Think again! You will open a variety of different locks, from ordinary button-operated ones, through zippers, and keycode locks. Then there’s those cases that just won’t open without the help of your trusty knife. And those filled with concealed bio-contaminants you just won’t detect without your Sniffer Tool. Did we mention some concealed items will only reveal themselves on the x-ray scanner? Let’s not even mention the Spray Tool. Expensive bags, precious contents, and spray paint - what could go wrong?

Dual gameplay
Not ready for VR? No problem! Baggage inspector allows you to also play on a traditional flatscreen, using mouse and keyboard.

Limitless gameplay
No two bags are ever alike, and no day’s job is ever the same, resulting in an ever-changing story. Play as much as you like!

data.name: Fissure : Cubic
data.detailed_description:
This is the playtest version!
Not everything below is in the playtest, but the first 8 puzzles are playable right now.

The year is 2013 in a universe very similar to ours, with the exception that humanity has made hundreds of years more progress in science and technology. Your road trip took a rough turn when a matter-phasing explosive round detonated in the street (which you were spared from by your skin embedded carbon nanostructure). You end up in a living metal structure used as a testbed for mechanical lifeforms (Mechforms). You will be challenged with puzzles originally designed for new AI to process and learn creativity. The human military is battling this great power and barely managing to make advancements through the city. You are lucky enough to have a chance alliance with the divergent Mechform Arc, who is indebted to you for saving his life. Now determined to forward your success, he will help your cause if your wits and problem solving skills are ready.

Special Features

VR and Standard Play Support
You do not need a VR Headset to play Fissure : Cubic.
Play in VR and use immersive controls for puzzle solving and physics interactions.
Play in Standard mode and enjoy enhanced graphics and a different movement style.

Specially Made Puzzles
Features a lot of puzzles crafted to work in interesting ways with the environment outside of the cube structures.


Evolution Algorithm
Robotic aircraft was fed through an "evolution" program I wrote that simulated wind pressure and sheer force with geometry "mutations" that affected the total wind resistance and outputted an altered version of human aircraft.


Detailed Environment
From the foamed metal of advanced Mechform materials to the bio-engineered leaves of the Maple tree, every piece of the environment has been finely detailed to create this alternate universe.

data.name: I'm Surrounded by Classical Beauties!
data.detailed_description:
The game supports VR mode. If you have a VR display device, it is strongly recommended to use streaming for a more immersive experience!

Game Introduction


"I'm Surrounded by Ancient Beauties!" is the world's first FMV game with both 2D and VR versions. You will play the role of a man who accidentally travels through time during a blind date. Unfortunately, instead of becoming a royal, you become the lowest servant in the He Mansion. To survive and travel back to normal life, you must find a way. Luckily, you didn't panic and quickly face the facts. Thanks to your modern knowledge, many crises were successfully resolved. With your intelligence and wit, you have won the favor of many beautiful ladies. Can you successfully get the help of these ladies? Can you seize every opportunity that comes to you? Be careful, your choice will determine your status in the He Mansion.

Yuerong He -- an innocent sundere young lady from He Mansion


Chunlan -- a considerate maid of Yuerong


RuYue -- the most talented and gorgeous lady in the country

Game features


  • With a VR version of the ultra-immersive experience, put on the VR device and instantly immerse yourself in any mansion, traveling with as your character.
  • First-person subjective perspective real-life shooting, personally playing the role of an ancient China character, experiencing every mission immersively.
  • The immersive interaction with Chinese ancient beauties, the real restoration of Chinese ancient scenes, you can hardly experience a 1v1 close-up interaction like this.
  • Multiple branches, multiple bonus scenes, multiple motion sensings, various plots are waiting for you to unlock! The VR version even provides you with ultra-immersive experience somatosensory interactions such as massage and facial slapping.

About us


As a studio that has been struggling in the VR industry for several years, it is a huge pressure for us to release an FMV game at this time. We are a team of creators who have always been passionate about VR content. Many VR partners have witnessed the rises and falls of our industry and still have a huge passion for the future of it. We are parts of them. The idea of "I'm Surrounded by Classical Beauties! " was born in early 2023. We believe that years of accumulated VR image production experience, combined with VR's unique immersive interaction, can bring audiences a richer listening and interactive experience. However, it will take a long time to truly achieve this idea. In this process, we have once again experienced the fluctuations of the industry and seen the interactive video game market become hot again due to the emergence of some popular products. We also know that our work is still quite rough compared to the mature production capabilities of flat video games.
- We understand that, compared with other 2D FMV games that are up to ten hours long, our product is shorter and can even refund players directly after the player completes the game.
- We understand that, compared to masterpieces like Detroit and Invisible Guardians, which have many more varied plot branches, this game will definitely be criticized by players for not having rich interactive design.
- We understand that, compared to the mutual traditional film and game production industry, VR production is still in an early exploration stage.
In order to let more players have a try on the charm of VR content, we decided to add a 2D version to this game. We sincerely hope that players who have experienced this work can provide us with your valuable feedback to help us to accumulate experience for our next work. A final warm reminder if you have the device, please do try the VR version, which is the ultimate FMV game experience we believed.

data.name: Monster: Titan's Playground
data.detailed_description:
Devastate a fully-destructible city in VR as a giant monster. Battle mechs using your various breath, ranged, and melee weapons—including fire breath, gravity cannon, and lock-on missile pods.

Experience what it's like to look down upon a city—and then crush it. Tear chunks out of buildings and toss them at your mechanical foes. Catch missiles out of the air and hurl them back at the mech that fired them. Even throw mechs into other mechs!



Feel the rage of a monster that's been mutated and experimented on by mad scientists—and enjoy the arsenal of pointlessly destructive weapons they've given you.

data.name: Connor
data.detailed_description:
Dive into the heart-pounding world of 'Connor,' an immersive VR adventure that seamlessly blends intense action, strategic shooting, exhilarating driving, and challenging platforming. As Connor, an elite agent, you find yourself thrust into a high-stakes mission when your wife is kidnapped by the Hive—an enigmatic rival organization with a grand vision for global transformation.

Embark on a relentless quest through a series of time-sensitive levels, each set in diverse environments ranging from bustling malls to labyrinthine warehouses, bustling docks, a perilous tanker, a speeding train, a soaring plane, and a high-speed car chase. The clock is ticking, adding an extra layer of urgency to your mission. Every second counts as you navigate through dynamic scenarios, utilizing a combination of sharpshooting skills, precise driving manoeuvres, and agile platforming to overcome challenges and adversaries.

'Connor' offers a riveting single-player experience that pushes the boundaries of VR gaming, delivering a seamless fusion of various gameplay elements. Immerse yourself in a cinematic narrative, fuelled by the pursuit of rescuing your loved one and thwarting the Hive's world-altering plans. With stylized visuals, responsive controls, and a pulse-pounding soundtrack, 'Connor' is poised to be an unforgettable VR journey that demands skill, speed, and strategy. Are you ready to take on the Hive and rewrite the fate of the world?
https://discord.gg/7s9xuk2Vc7

data.name: Meta Visual Art
data.detailed_description:
The Meta-Visual Exhibition, which brings together technology and creativity, aims to transcend traditional boundaries of art and provide an original perspective on the future of art. Filled with virtual installations and interactive experiences, this exhibition combines the works of contemporary artists with virtual setups to offer viewers a unique art experience.

Interaction

Meta-Visual not only showcases artworks but also pushes the boundaries of art by allowing viewers to interact with the pieces. By merging art with the advantages of the digital world, Meta-Visual aims to provide art enthusiasts with an experience beyond being mere spectators.

Aesthetic Convergence with Technology

This special exhibition aims to redefine traditional art appreciation by providing a platform for art enthusiasts who wish to delve into the depths of art through virtual reality. The Meta-Visual Exhibition seeks to merge the evolution of technology with art, offering visitors a memorable and inspiring art experience.

Multiplayer

Experience a collective multiplayer in a gallery you can visit from anywhere.

data.name: Ninja - waltz of night
data.detailed_description:
"Ninja-Waltz of Night" is an action and roguelike VR game where you embark on a blood-pumping monster-slaying adventure. In the game, you take on the role of a ninja wielding dual blades, slashing through enemies, progressively growing stronger. Come and test how far you can go in clearing stages!

Game Features:

1. Dual Sword Slashes, Swing Freely
Players embody a ninja, wielding dual swords to unleash horizontal and vertical slashes—engage in battles as you please!

2. Charged Ultimate Move, Sword Energy Unleashed
With each swing, accumulate "Sword Energy." Once fully charged, release a powerful sword wave upon your enemies.

3. Diverse Levels, Varied Monsters
Explore a range of enemies, from melee to ranged and summoning monsters—rich defensive strategies await your discovery.

4. Choose Cards, Unlock Skills
At the end of each level, unlock random upgrades and face even more formidable foes!

5. Listen for Positioning, Ears Open on All Sides
Utilize a unique sound positioning gameplay—players must rely on spatial sound effects, listening on all sides to prevent monster flanking attacks.

Quickly pick up your dual swords and embark on the adrenaline-fueled journey of slashing monsters and defeating enemies!

We are an independent game studio passionate about VR. "Ninja-Waltz of Night" is our debut title, and we plan to release more levels, skills, and weapons in the future. Stay tuned for updates!

Supports two types of left and right rudders and related traffic rules around the world

Including two models: C1 manual and C2 automatic.

Complete set of subjects 2

Complete set of subjects

: starting, shifting, right turn, left turn, lane changing, turning, overtaking, meeting, pulling over, passing public transportation, school, sidewalk, and mock exams

data.name: DeepSea Serenity: VR Underwater Trip
data.detailed_description:
This is a realistic VR visual experience game in which you play as a beautiful woman who freely travels through the magnificent underwater world.



The game features multiple scenarios that allow players to explore the mysteries of the ocean floor to their heart's content, each with a unique visual experience. You will be captivated by the wonders of the deep-sea world, and you will encounter various deep-sea creatures such as giant whales, squid, and many more. The creatures are realistically animated and make you feel like you're in a real marine environment, and in the shallow waters, you'll see a variety of glowing underwater flora and fauna.
The game is very well designed, with each scene featuring unique sea creatures and landscapes. Rich colors and light and shadow effects allow players to truly feel the mystery and beauty of the underwater world.
In addition to the visual experience, the game also provides players with a variety of fish plants, etc., which will swing with the player's actions, adding to the fun of the game and allowing players to better immerse themselves in the underwater world.
All in all, it is a very interesting game that gives players the freedom to explore the mysteries of the underwater world and experience the beauty and mystery of the ocean. If you like the vast ocean world, then this game is not to be missed.

data.name: Insect Flight Simulator VR
data.detailed_description:
This is a casual VR game that simulates insect flights, which immersed players in the beautiful world of insects. In the game, players can control the flying trajectory of the butterfly through the handle and feel the thrill of insects soaring the sky.



A total of three virgin forest scenes are designed, each scene shows a unique natural beauty. Players can choose to enter different scenes and explore the wonderfulness of nature. These scenes are planted with all kinds of animals and plants, such as towering trees and booming grasslands. These lifelike natural elements will make players seem to be in real forests and enjoy the charm of nature. Players need to be careful when exploring the forest. Some animals are not friendly. If the butterflies are close to them, they may attack butterflies.
In order to enhance the leisure experience of the game, the game uses soothing music and beautiful scenery. Beautiful background music will bring players a relaxed and happy mood, allowing players to be completely immersed in the game world. At the same time, the game also pays attention to the presentation of details. The carefully designed scene and color matching allows players to feel the beauty of nature. This tranquil atmosphere and a sense of relaxation make the changing game a great game choice to relax and mind. Put on the VR device and start your butterfly flight trip!



Operation method:
Fly left/right Left handle left/right
Fly forward/back Left handle up/down
Fly up/down Right handle up/down
Turn Right handle left/right
Camera Grip
Menu Menu key

data.name: XWarShooterVR
data.detailed_description:
OUR SERVER IN DISCORD


Roadmap


About the Game

Welcome to the immersive world of "XWarShooterVR" a VR shooter where the combination of devastating guns, epic technomagic skills, and base-building strategy delivers an immersive gaming experience.


GAME FEATURES:

TRAINING:
Improve your warriors in martial arts, choose from over 75 characters, each with a unique set of skills. Develop their abilities, upgrade a variety of weapons with different ranges and power. Emphasize the singularity of each hero, shaping their unique style of fighting on the battlefield.


WIN HOWEVER YOU WANT:
Are you a team player or do you prefer solo attacks? Protect allies from enemies or rain meteorites down on your opponents' heads - choose your path to victory. With countless combinations of military arsenal, technomagic skills and a variety of heroes, you choose your play style.


EQUIPMENT:
Each hero is armed with three weapons and boosters. Assemble your deadly combination, boost your power and dominate the battlefield. Become a strategist and weapon master to surpass your opponents.


BUILD:
Build your base, collect resources and boosters to stay one step ahead of the enemy not only in battles but also in building a strong and impregnable base. Take your tactical skills to the next level.


COMPETE:
Take on the challenge and prove your skills in a unique blend of shooter and strategy. Team up with your battle buddies, socialize and compete in exciting battles.


Hone your combat and base-building skills, because in "XWarShooterVR" you will not only have to fight your opponents on the battlefield, but also attack other people's bases, create and defend your own fortifications.
Join "XWarShooterVR" and become a legend in this exciting VR world!

data.name: VR Houses: Glass Apartment
data.detailed_description:
VR Houses: Glass Apartment is a groundbreaking experience where photorealism takes center stage. Step beyond the borders of traditional VR games and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic digital environment.

Explore the design of a modern apartment where every detail is crafted for unparalleled realism. Wander freely through the space and change levels as you witness the stunning transition from a sunlit day to the calming ambiance of a rainy evening. Marvel at the lifelike textures, the play of light and shadow, and the calming atmosphere that surrounds you. Whether you're basking in the warmth of a sunny day or embracing the tranquility of a rainy evening.

VR Houses: Glass Apartment invites you to walk through the threshold of photorealism, where your digital environment becomes indistinguishable from reality. Step in, explore, and witness a new era in virtual living.

Welcome to your digital home.

data.name: Bone and Arrow
data.detailed_description:
Bone and Arrow asks the question: If you and your companions were left in a world with nothing but bones and arrows, how would you fare? Would you live on to fight the advancing waves of the skeleton army? Would you succumb to the bone hoard? Or perhaps you would be betrayed by an arrow through the noggin shot by a fellow archer. Grab your bow and arrows to find out!

Well looky what we have here...

Nobody said a post-apocalyptic fantasy world is an excuse to dress down. Customize your character to the nines with literally tens of options to choose from head to toe. You want to wear a lilac leather strappy number? Bam, you got it. How about golden metal cuirass with accompanying greaves and boots? Say no more. Full frontal nudity to strike fear into the enemy? That's actually a step too far, but might I suggest a tasteful loincloth instead?

Can't we all just get along?

Nope. Well, sort of. Create or join a room of up to 8 players and enjoy the absurd and violent shenanigans that can only be brought to you by full bodied VR characters. Face off in game modes such as death match, team death match and capture the flag to see whose aim reigns supreme.

Can I set people on fire?

These are the important questions every developer must ask themselves when setting out to make a game. And the answer should always be a resounding, "yeah, alright". Equip magical arrows and other power up items to give you the edge on the battlefield. Ignite, explode and electrocute your way to the top of the scoreboard.
